hero.title: Let Me Turn Your Idea Into
hero.subtitle: I help turn your vision into a powerful reality‚Äîthrough custom websites, mobile apps, and intelligent AI-driven solutions.

items.title: Web Development
items.description: Fast, mobile-friendly websites using React, Next.js, or WordPress

items.title: Mobile Apps

items.title: AI Integrations

items.title: Admin Dashboards

items.title: Custom Software
items.description: Tailored software solutions to address your specific business challenges.

steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: You fill out a quick form to describe your idea, features, and target audience.

steps.title: Proposal
steps.description: I prepare a clear roadmap with time, cost, and recommended tech.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: I create modern mockups in Figma based on your vision. I'll also provide a branded design kit.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: I build the site or app using React, Python, or modern stacks optimized for speed.

steps.title: Launch
steps.description: I handle deployment to live servers and ensure a smooth rollout.

steps.title: Maintenance
steps.description: I provide ongoing support, updates, and improvements to keep your project running smoothly.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Who's Behind S.N.P?
about.description: I'm a solo developer with years of experience in AI, full-stack development, and software for government and defense industries. I code smart, work fast, and speak tech fluently‚Äîso you don't have to.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Get In Touch
contact.description: Have a project in mind or want to discuss your tech needs? I'm just a message away!

info.heading: Let's talk about your project
info.text: Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or ideas. I'm always open to discussing new projects and opportunities.

form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Thank you for your message! I'll get back to you soon.
